page.title: 01 CHESTER
page.content: I WAS BORN IN CHESTER BUT I DON'T KNOW A LOT ABOUT IT.IT HAS A LOT OF MOCK_TUDOR BUILDINGS AND CHURCHES.IT ALSO HAS A LARGE CATHEDRAL.THERE IS A STATUE IN THE MIDDLE OF TOWN WHICH IS CALLED THE CROSS.THE TOWN CRYER SHOUTS OUT MESSAGES AND NEWS.THERE ARE PARKS WITH FLOWER BEDS AND PONDS.IN SOME PARTS OF CHESTER THERE ARE MANY MODERN HOUSES.CHESTER IS DIVIDED INTO DISTRICTS FOR EXAMPLE, BOUGHTON,HANDBRIDGE,HUNTINGTON AND UPTON.WE GET MANY TOURISTS IN CHESTER,ESPECIALLY AMERICANS.THEY COME TO LOOK AT THE ONLY REMAINING FULL SET OF CITY WALLS IN BRITAIN.THE WALLS AS THEY ARE TODAY DATE FROM MEDIEVAL TIMES ALTHOUGH A MAN DRESSED AS A ROMAN SOLDIER LEADS GUIDED TOURS.THERE ARE ROMAN REMAINS IN CHESTER.THE AMPITHEATRE AND A CORNER TOWER BEING
